subject: [junit] Class listener
msgSnippet: Hi, Is there going to be listener that support @BeforeClass and @AfterClass ? I was able to implement this but for doing so I was need to override the junit
messageBody:
Hi,

Is there going to be listener that support @BeforeClass and @AfterClass ?

I was able to implement this but for doing so I was need to override the
junit runners for class,suite and paramerized.
I also need to change the AllDefaultPossibilitiesBuilder method to call my
runners.
In these runner I call myRunBefores and myRunAfters .

We are going now to new project.
If there will be support in the next release in this feature I will be able
to remove lot of code and override of junit classes which will be great.

Is there going to be new release ?
Are you going to support listener for start and finish of @BeforeClass and
@AfterClass ?

Thanks
--

Sent from the JUnit - User mailing list archive at Nabble.com.
